unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hitting the Road!**
normalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hitting the Road!**

unnormalised: Hey gearheads! The Indian auto market is heating up faster than a Delhi summer. This week saw a flurry of vehicle launches that’ll make your chai spill!
normalised: Hey gearheads! The Indian auto market is heating up faster than a Delhi summer. This week saw a flurry of vehicle launches that will make your chai spill!

unnormalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki unveiled the all-new 'Desi Dreamer' hatchback, boasting a mileage that’ll make even Dr. Kalam proud! Early reports suggest it’s perfect for those crazy Mumbai traffic jams.
normalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki unveiled the all-new 'Desi Dreamer' hatchback, boasting a mileage that will make even Doctor Kalam proud! Early reports suggest it is perfect for those crazy Mumbai traffic jams.

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors showcased their electric SUV, the 'Gharonda EV', promising a range of 500 km on a single charge. Imagine cruising from Bangalore to Chennai without a worry!
normalised: Then, Tata Motors showcased their electric S U V, the 'Gharonda E V', promising a range of five hundred kilometer on a single charge. Imagine cruising from Bangalore to Chennai without a worry!

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Mahindra launched the updated Scorpio, now with even more ruggedness and a whopping 200 sq ft of boot space – perfect for those family road trips to Rajasthan!
normalised: Not to be left behind, Mahindra launched the updated Scorpio, now with even more ruggedness and a whopping two hundred square feet of boot space – perfect for those family road trips to Rajasthan!

unnormalised: Price points are looking competitive, with the 'Desi Dreamer' starting at around Rs. 5 Lakhs. Are you ready to upgrade your ride?
normalised: Price points are looking competitive, with the 'Desi Dreamer' starting at around rupees five lakhs. Are you ready to upgrade your ride?

unnormalised: These new entrants promise to shake things up, folks! Keep an eye out for detailed reviews hitting your screens soon. Happy driving!
normalised: These new entrants promise to shake things up, folks! Keep an eye out for detailed reviews hitting your screens soon. Happy driving!
